channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Trump Mobile’s origins lie with a Mexican middleweight boxer
item.description: Where's the Trump phone? We're going to keep talking about it every week. Last week, we spoke to executives from the company for the first time, and this week we're back with more details on how it began. Trump Mobile may bear the US president's name, but he didn't come up with the idea, and […]

item.title: On est monté à bord du Genesis Electrified GV70 : pourquoi cette voiture électrique pourrait peiner face aux allemands
item.description: C'est officiel : Genesis, marque premium de Hyundai, arrive en France avec trois voitures électriques. Nous avons pu monter à bord du Genesis Electrified GV70, un SUV qui vise les BMW iX3 et autres Volvo EX60 avec sa présentation soignée et sa charge ultra-rapide. Voici nos premières impressions.

item.title: Wrexham vs Ipswich Town Free Streams: How to Watch FA Cup 4th Round Tie 2025/26 Online From Anywhere
item.description: All the ways to watch Wrexham vs Ipswich in the FA Cup 4rd Round at the Racecourse Ground on Friday night.

item.title: How to watch F1 on Apple TV – F1 TV Pro, free trial, devices explained
item.description: We're embarking on a whole new era for Formula One – and not just on track. Here's how to watch F1 on Apple TV in 2026.

item.title: Roku to launch streaming bundles as part of its efforts to continue growing its profitability
item.description: Roku delivered an impressive Q4, posting net income of $80.5 million. The company also outlined plans for streaming bundles.

item.title: Deezer lance Flow Tuner pour personnaliser les recommandations musicales
item.description: Deezer enrichit son système de recommandations avec Flow Tuner, une nouvelle fonctionnalité qui permet aux utilisateurs d’ajuster finement leurs différents Flow en fonction de leurs habitudes d’écoute et des moments de la journée.

item.title: DJI Avata 2 : tout pour voler avec un drone de manière immersive, mais sans payer le prix fort grâce à cette offre
item.description: Le pack contenant le drone DJI Avata 2, avec le casque Goggles 3 et le stabilisateur RC Motion 3, s'affiche en ce moment à 719 euros au lieu de 849 euros. Il en valait 999 euros au lancement.

item.title: Oubliez la Surface Pro : le futur PC hybride de Lenovo corrige le pire défaut de ce format
item.description: Deux ans après la sortie du X12 Gen 2, Lenovo s'apprête à ressusciter son format tablette hybride pour les pros. Plus fin, avec des bordures réduites et un clavier revu pour corriger l'un des plus gros défauts du format, le ThinkPad X13 Detachable a tout pour faire de l'ombre à la Surface Pro de Microsoft.

item.title: Don’t let the RAM crisis stop you upgrading your PC — these 5 brilliant monitor deals can make a world of difference without breaking the bank
item.description: Thanks to the RAM crisis, buying a new monitor is now one of the most affordable PC upgrades you can make – as these great deals prove.

item.title: What’s in the Epstein files? For Tiktokers, a content gold mine
item.description: "where are you? Are you ok , I loved the torture video," reads one email, allegedly sent by Jeffrey Epstein in 2009. The reply, from a redacted address, states: "I am in china I will be in the US 2nd week of may." Her face hovering over a screenshot of the exchange, a TikTok creator […]

item.title: Samsung explains the new tech that's making its 2026 flagship OLED TV so much brighter — and promises the screen should last twice as long, too
item.description: Samsung has explained the clever QD-OLED Penta Tandem technology that means its 2026 OLEDs will be much brighter and last longer

item.title: VR : Meta n’a pas dit son dernier mot, deux nouveaux casques Quest serait en préparation
item.description: Les casques Quest ont encore un peu de jus. Malgré les charrettes de licenciements et les fermetures de studios, Meta aurait toujours l'intention de lancer de nouveaux modèles de casques VR — dont un dédié aux jeux vidéo.

item.title: Russia is using DNS and DPI to block YouTube, Telegram and WhatsApp while pushing state-controlled MAX as alternative
item.description: Russia has completely blocked access to Telegram, WhatsApp, and YouTube. Citizens keep looking for ways around, but VPNs are also being targeted.

item.title: A Stanford grad student created an algorithm to help his classmates find love; now, Date Drop is the basis of his new startup
item.description: "Our matches convert to actual dates at about 10x the rate of Tinder," Weng told TechCrunch.

item.title: iRobot’s Roombas have a new Chinese owner, but it says your data will remain in the US
item.description: As part of its acquisition by China-based Picea Robotics, iRobot is creating a new US-based subsidiary called iRobot Safe, which the company says will be "responsible for the protection of US consumer data," similar to the TikTok deal that was completed last month. iRobot customers in the US will be able to continue using their […]

item.title: These are the Xbox controllers I rely on — and I can recommend each and every one after hours of hands-on testing
item.description: These are the Xbox controllers that I can personally recommend after my hands-on testing.

item.title: « Il faut prendre des pincettes » : pourquoi le patron de Mercedes tire la sonnette d’alarme dans la guerre commerciale avec la Chine
item.description: Alors que Bruxelles s'apprête à dévoiler son plan pour relocaliser la production automobile européenne, le PDG de Mercedes appelle à la prudence. Entre nécessité de contrer l'offensive chinoise et risque de guerre commerciale, l'industrie automobile du Vieux Continent se trouve à la croisée des chemins.

item.title: White House Withholds Funding for NASA Science Missions Despite Recent Budget Bill
item.description: NASA has been forced to pause funds for Chandra X-Ray Observatory and other missions until further notice.

item.title: Zillow Has Gone Wild—for AI
item.description: As the housing market stalls, Zillow’s CEO sees AI as “an ingredient rather than a threat” that can both help the company protect its turf and reinvent how people search for homes.

item.title: Elon Musk suggests spate of xAI exits have been push, not pull
item.description: At least nine engineers, including two co-founders, have announced their exits from xAI in the past week, fueling online speculation and raising questions about stability at Musk’s AI company amid mounting controversy.

item.title: Ring’s adorable surveillance hellscape
item.description: You can watch Ring's recent Super Bowl ad and see a cute story about dogs being reunited with their families. You can also watch the very same ad and see the seeds being planted for a massively connected, utterly ubiquitous surveillance system that will end the concept of privacy forever. Maybe you can even see […]

item.title: With the God of War trilogy remake confirmed, I need something to help tide me over until it releases — and Sons of Sparta is starting to do exactly that
item.description: The God of War trilogy remake is coming, and jumping into the Sons of Sparta 2D action game to see Kratos' real beginning brings a new perspective to the series.

item.title: Feeling swamped by all the different AI agent names? GoDaddy has a new plan for avoiding confusion
item.description: GoDaddy's Agent Name Service and the ANS Registry and the world's first agentic AI trust layer.

item.title: Pick up Apple's iPhone Air MagSafe battery pack while it's down to a record-low price
item.description:
Despite its supremely sleek design, the iPhone Air actually has a pretty respectable battery life, lasting for somewhere in the region of 27 hours if you’re continuously streaming video. But you’re still going to be wary of it dying on you if you’re on a trip or just having a particularly screen-heavy day. That’s where Apple’s iPhone Air MagSafe battery pack comes in, and it’s currently on sale for $79.
This accessory only works with the iPhone Air, but much like the phone it attaches to, it’s extremely slim at 7.5mmm, so crucially doesn’t add so much bulk when attached that it defeats the p...

item.title: ‘Home Alone-Inspired’ Drug Dealer Who Rigged House With Booby Traps Gets 7 Years in Prison
item.description: The man was not as clever as Kevin McCallister, but he did invent a combination flame thrower/fire extinguisher.

item.title: The Return of the ‘Razor Crest’ in ‘Mandalorian and Grogu’ Is Even Sillier Than We Thought
item.description: Meet the new Razor Crest—same as the old Razor Crest.

item.title: The Verge’s 2026 Valentine’s Day gift guide (for her)
item.description: Valentine's Day often comes with more pressure than it needs to. At heart, though, February 14th is about showing appreciation for the people you care about in ways that feel thoughtful and sincere. And while big displays of romance can do that, it's often the quieter, more personal gestures - or a meaningful gift that […]

item.title: ‘Wellness’ feels like it’s losing all meaning in health tech
item.description: This is Optimizer, a weekly newsletter sent every Friday from Verge senior reviewer Victoria Song that dissects and discusses the latest gizmos and potions that swear they're going to change your life. Opt in for Optimizer here. For the past week, I've been thinking about the fact that Oura has gone to Washington. The Oura […]

item.title: The new Kingdom Come: Deliverance 'next gen' update adds 4K support and 'ultra' graphics on consoles — and it's free if you already own the game
item.description: A new 'next gen' update for Kingdom Come: Deliverance has been released, adding new feature for modern consoles.

item.title: The latest Control Resonant gameplay trailer showcases new zones, abilities, and progression, which Remedy says 'is all about building your perfect combat flow'
item.description: Remedy Entertainment has released the first full gameplay trailer for Control Resonant, showcasing a "paranatural" warped Manhattan, new abilities, and zones to explore.

item.title: There’s One, and Only One, Reason To Get Excited for the Samsung Galaxy S26
item.description: It's a feature for people who can't stand strangers staring at their phone screens.

item.title: Dutch phone giant Odido says millions of customers affected by data breach
item.description: The Dutch phone giant Odido is the latest phone and internet company to be hacked in recent months, as governments and financially motivated hackers continue to steal highly confidential information about phone customers.

item.title: The best Presidents Day mattress deals — score up to 60% off mattresses, beds, sheets, and pillows
item.description: President's Day mattress sales include saving up to 60% from brands like Purple, Bear, Avocado, Naturepedic, and more.

item.title: Good Luck, Have Fun, Don't Die rails against AI in style
item.description: You've seen this movie before: A disheveled man (Sam Rockwell) busts into a restaurant, threatening to blow up the joint unless a crew of people joins him. Like Groundhog Day, he's been through this countless times before, and he immediately starts recounting otherwise unknowable details to convince the diner patrons. Like 12 Monkeys, he's from the future — the timely twist in Good Luck, Have Fun, Don't Die is that, rather than a world-ending virus, he needs help preventing a humanity-ending AI from being born. Good Luck is more of a primal scream than a thoughtful articulation about where eve...

item.title: Moon phase today: What the Moon will look like on February 13
item.description: See the Moon phase expected for February 13, 2025 as well as when the next Full Moon is expected.

item.title: Amazon’s Ring cancels partnership with Flock, a network of AI cameras used by ICE, feds, and police
item.description: This news comes less than a week after Ring's Super Bowl commercial stoked controversy over the company's capacity for mass surveillance.

item.title: Pornhubs U.S. Valentines Day map is extremely telling
item.description: Pornhub released its map of How Americans Are Getting in the Mood for Valentine's Day.

item.title: Fin de la 2G : Free Mobile pousse ses abonnés à changer de téléphone
item.description: Free Mobile a commencé à prévenir ses clients toujours en 2G qu'il va falloir migrer rapidement vers des réseaux plus modernes. En toile de fond : la fermeture définitive de la 2G d'Orange.

item.title: I tried Nintendo’s free Hello Mario app — and I can’t believe how fun it is (yes, it’s for kids)
item.description: Nintendo built a new, free Hello Mario app; we got a chance to try it and now can't wait to try it again.

item.title: Forget Valentine's Day — BBC has just dropped first look clip for the deranged romantic crime drama I'm most excited for this year
item.description: The best romance dramas aren't releasing this Valentine's Day — my most-anticipated BBC iPlayer show of the year just got its first look, and it's outright disturbing.

item.title: Move over, Apple and Samsung – this Huawei smartwatch has a world-first diabetes feature, but there’s a catch
item.description: The Huawei Watch GT 6 Pro smartwatch can now measure your blood sugar levels in a non-invasive way thanks to a new update.

item.title: Meta’s Quest 3S is $50 off, and includes Batman: Arkham Shadow for free
item.description: Meta’s VR strategy is in a bit of an uncertain place right now, with the company recently cutting many jobs at its Reality Labs, and discontinuing new content drops in beloved experiences like Supernatural. Even so, there’s still a lot of fun to be had with its Meta Quest 3S if you’ve been curious about […]

item.title: Pick up this Samsung microSD Express card while it's on sale for $40 off
item.description: If you're looking to expand the storage on your Switch 2, the 512GB Samsung P9 microSD Express card is on sale right now for 33 percent off, marked down to $80 from $120. With component prices skyrocketing these days, it's getting increasingly rare to see good storage on sale, and 512GB for $80 is a much better deal than you'll currently find directly from Nintendo. The P9 boasts transfer speeds of up to 800MB/s, making moving games to the card that much faster. As for load times, in our testing we found that any microSD Express, the standard the Switch 2 requires, will offer roughly the same ...

item.title: La récente manette 8BitDo Pro 3, dont les boutons sont interchangeables, chute sous les 50 € grâce à ce code promo
item.description: Si vous cherchez une nouvelle manette Bluetooth astucieusement conçue pour jouer sur PC, smartphone ou Switch, alors la 8BitDo Pro 3 devrait vous convenir. Elle est actuellement disponible à un excellent prix sur AliExpress : 47,39 euros au lieu de 69,99 euros.

item.title: Ce radar vélo boosté à l’IA cartographique les portions les plus dangereuses de vos trajets
item.description: Prévu pour cet été 2026, le radar vélo Luna Oculus dispose d’une caméra qui détecte les véhicules à l’approche, sert de rétroviseur arrière, et montre les points critiques sur vos trajets.

item.description: Season 3 of "Interview with the Vampire," now "The Vampire Lestat," has released Lestat de Lioncourt's (Sam Reid) first single.

item.title: ICE moves out to the suburbs

"They're all on this fucking street now," Lety, a lifelong resident of the Minnesota suburbs, told me. ICE had been spotted at a gas station and a […]

item.title: The DJI Pocket 3 finally has a new rival – meet the Insta360 Luna, the world’s first compact dual-lens vlogging camera
item.description: Insta360 has officially unveiled its first pocket gimbal camera, and the CEO is making it clear this isn't just a DJI Osmo Pocket rip-off.

item.title: Meta reportedly wants to add face recognition to smart glasses while privacy advocates are distracted
item.description: Meta aims to introduce facial recognition to its smart glasses while its biggest critics are distracted, according to a report from The New York Times. In an internal document reviewed by The Times, Meta says it will launch the feature "during a dynamic political environment where many civil society groups that we would expect to […]

item.title: Comment utiliser un Samsung Galaxy SmartTag sur n’importe quel smartphone Android
item.description: Vous ne possédez pas de smartphone Samsung mais souhaitez acheter les SmartTag ? Bonne nouvelle : un développeur ingénieux a fait sauter le verrou écosystémique imposé par le constructeur coréen. Grâce à une application open source, ces traceurs Bluetooth fonctionnent désormais avec n'importe quel smartphone Android.

item.title: WP Engine-Automattic feud resurfaces with new claims of royalty fees and contract threats
item.description: WP Engine just updated its legal claim against Automattic, but CEO Matt Mullenweg isn't concerned.

item.title: Cohere’s $240M year sets stage for IPO
item.description: Cohere surpassed $240 million in annual recurring revenue in 2025, highlighting strong enterprise AI demand as the Canadian startup positions itself for a potential IPO amid intensifying competition from OpenAI and Anthropic.

item.title: How AI-powered threats are rewriting email security economics
item.description: AI-driven false positives drain SOC capacity while attackers exploit noise and outdated security architectures.

item.title: Microsoft fait retirer un jeu de Steam par erreur à cause de l’IA
item.description: Un robot de protection de droits d’auteur de Microsoft a confondu un titre indépendant avec Minecraft, entraînant la suppression momentanée du jeu du catalogue Steam.

item.title: Meta plans to add facial recognition to its smart glasses, report claims
